edu.wpi.grip.core.operations.composite

Class HSVThresholdOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.grip.core.operations.composite.ThresholdOperation
      • edu.wpi.grip.core.operations.composite.HSVThresholdOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation

    public class HSVThresholdOperation
extends ThresholdOperation
    An Operation that converts a color image into a binary image based on the HSV threshold ranges for each channel

      • perform

        public void perform(InputSocket<?>[] inputs,
                    OutputSocket<?>[] outputs,
                    java.util.Optional<?> data)
        Description copied from interface: Operation
        Perform the operation on the specified inputs, storing the results in the specified outputs.
        Parameters:
        inputs - An array obtained from Operation.createInputSockets(EventBus). The caller can set the value of each socket to an actual parameter for the operation.
        outputs - An array obtained from Operation.createOutputSockets(EventBus). The outputs of the operation will be stored in these sockets.
        data - Optional data to be passed to the operation
